summary: The wolf dog, White Fang, aids a reporter, a fur trapper, a nun, a young Eskimo boy and his father of ridding a gold mining town of a sleazy crime lord in 1896 Yukon, Canada.
cast: Franco Nero|Virna Lisi|Fernando Rey|John Steiner|Raimund Harmstorf|Daniel Martín|Rik Battaglia|Daniele Dublino|Maurice Poli|John Bartha|Luigi Antonio Guerra|Carla Mancini|Missaele|Carole André|Mirko Baiocchi|Angelo Boscariol|Tony Casale|Massimo Ciprari|Aldo Formisano|Decio Gabin|Alfonso Giganti|Antonio Gismondo|Silvio Klein|Ennio Majani|Quinto Marziale|Giulio Massimini|Romano Moraschini|Renzo Pevarello|Nando Sarlo|Roberto Sbarigia|Maurizio Streccioni|Romano Targa
title: Colmillo Blanco
